amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that Congress should provide dedicated funding for port security enhancements.

action.text: Amendment SA 223, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 223 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 223 proposed by Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S2835-2836; text: CR S2835) To express the sense of the Senate that Congress should provide dedicated funding for port security enhancements.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 223 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 223 proposed by Senator Vitter.
